about:
I am an IT professional with a background in Computer Engineering and Networking, experienced in Technical Support and Software Quality Assurance in application testing. 


 Currently, I am focused on learning backend technologies, data analysis, and web-based application development. 
 I really love my job. Because I love what I do, I have a constant source of motivation that drives me to do my best. 

 And one thing that drives me to keep going is a slogan that I created for myself is **life for code**
